https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mSBObkiA1spT1AeCekDc4IMrMsA.jpg Masquerading as another man, Antoine flies to New York for a three-day stay and promptly falls in love with Alice, who's dating someone else. When that doesn't work out for him, Antoine turns to the city itself for inspiration. A NY Thing
